title: (Weds Early Bird) Alicia Silverstone on Working with Rebel Wilson and Her 90’s Movies + Listener Has A Beef with Bobby + Mailbag: How Long to Wait for Boyfriend to Propose?
itunes:title: (Weds Early Bird) Alicia Silverstone on Working with Rebel Wilson and Her 90’s Movies + Listener Has A Beef with Bobby + Mailbag: How Long to Wait for Boyfriend to Propose?
description:
We talk to Alicia Silverstone about her No. 1 Hulu movie, working with Rebel Wilson on her No. 1 Netflix movie and her new podcast. We also asked her some questions about her 90’s movie roles and her first ever acting credit. Bobby addresses a concern a listener had with him about a song not being ‘country’. In the mailbag, a listener needs advice on what to do about her boyfriend of 5 years who is putting off proposing. How long should she wait before bailing??

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
